articles.title: Android 15 Beta 1 and the curious case of 'Pixel Weather' - 9to5Google
articles.description: With the Android 15 Beta, the exclusive Pixel nature of these weather widgets has been enshrined. To coincide...
articles.content: To coincide with the Android 12 push and Material You, Google introduced a pair of weather widgets for Pixel in 2021. With the Android 15 Beta, the exclusive Pixel nature of these weather widgets has… [+2047 chars]
